item.title: About

item.description: Hello, nice off you to check out my site!

item.title: Learning Odin
item.author: christiaan@drunkturtle.com (Christiaan Janssen)
item.description:
Recently I started looking into the Odin programming language. I was writing a side project in C but got stuck at some point. As I was doing some Googeling and Searching through Youtube I came across the channel from Karl Zylinski, specially his tutorial videos about Odin and Raylib.

Odin and Raylib

item.title: Hello World
item.author: christiaan@drunkturtle.com (Christiaan Janssen)
item.description: Welcome to version 5 of Drunkturtle! Every time I start this with the best of intentions, and every time it ends up being more work then I would have thought.
